name: nanbi2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w2, w0), wnan(w2, w1)))

stmt.origin: 3bitr4g(wb(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w0), wnan(w2, w1), wnan(w0, w2), wnan(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w2, w0), wnan(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w0, w2), wnan(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wnan(w2, w0), wnan(w0, w2))
-| wb(wnan(w2, w1), wnan(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w2, w0), wnan(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w0, w2), wnan(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wnan(w2, w0), wnan(w0, w2))
-| wb(wnan(w2, w1), wnan(w1, w2))

body.origin: |- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w0, w2), wnan(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w2, w0), wnan(w2, w1)))
-| wb(wnan(w2, w0), wnan(w0, w2))
-| wb(wnan(w2, w1), wnan(w1, w2))

|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w2, w0), wnan(w2, w1)))
-| wb(wnan(w2, w1), wnan(w1, w2))
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w2, w0), wnan(w2, w1)))

comment: Introduce a left anti-conjunct to both sides of a logical equivalence. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 1-Sep-2011.) (Proof shortened by SF, 2-Jan-2018.)
